content.prompt: Maria Mart√≠nez and other Pueblo potters changed their ceramics to appeal to tourists by

choices.label: painting all their vessels black to be more marketable as sets
changing the materials so that the vessels were less fragile
signing their individual names on vessels to attract collectors
incorporating romanticized designs from the American West

topic.text: 5.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
